name: hub_payment
description: This table records detailed information about payment transactions processed through the system.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the transaction was processed in the system.

columns.name: tranx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each transaction.

columns.name: tranx_type
columns.description: The category or nature of the transaction.

columns.name: client_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the client involved in the transaction.

columns.name: mobile_no
columns.description: The mobile number associated with the client.

columns.name: from_acc
columns.description: The account from which the transaction amount is debited.

columns.name: to_acc
columns.description: The account to which the transaction amount is credited.

columns.name: provider_code
columns.description: Code representing the service provider handling the transaction.

columns.name: service_code
columns.description: Code representing the specific service used in the transaction.

columns.name: cus_code
columns.description: A unique code identifying the customer involved in the transaction.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The total amount of money involved in the transaction.

columns.name: tranx_note
columns.description: Additional notes or comments about the transaction.

columns.name: tranx_status
columns.description: The current status of the transaction (e.g., completed, pending).

columns.name: tranx_time
columns.description: The exact time when the transaction was executed.

columns.name: res_code
columns.description: Code indicating the outcome of the transaction processing.

columns.name: device_id
columns.description: Identifier for the device used to initiate the transaction.

columns.name: flat_fee
columns.description: A fixed fee charged for processing the transaction.

columns.name: fee_on_amt
columns.description: A fee calculated as a percentage of the transaction amount.

columns.name: real_amount
columns.description: The actual amount received after deducting fees.

columns.name: ccy
columns.description: The currency in which the transaction is conducted.

columns.name: tranx_remark
columns.description: Additional remarks or comments about the transaction.

columns.name: product_type
columns.description: The type of product or service associated with the transaction.

columns.name: discount
columns.description: Any discount applied to the transaction.

columns.name: tranx_refno
columns.description: A reference number associated with the transaction.

columns.name: branch_code
columns.description: Code representing the branch where the transaction was processed.

columns.name: service_type
columns.description: The category of service provided in the transaction.

columns.name: charge_to
columns.description: The account that bears the charges for the transaction.

columns.name: credit_name_en
columns.description: The name of the credit recipient in English.

columns.name: credit_name_vn
columns.description: The name of the credit recipient in Vietnamese.

columns.name: bene_bank_code
columns.description: Code representing the bank of the beneficiary.

columns.name: cus_name
columns.description: The name of the customer involved in the transaction.

columns.name: remit_number
columns.description: A number identifying the remittance associated with the transaction.

columns.name: pay_channel
columns.description: The channel through which the payment was made (e.g., online, mobile).

columns.name: bill_id
columns.description: An identifier for the bill associated with the transaction.

columns.name: from_ccy
columns.description: The currency from which the transaction amount is converted.

columns.name: to_ccy
columns.description: The currency to which the transaction amount is converted.

columns.name: pos_code
columns.description: Code representing the point of sale where the transaction occurred.

columns.name: bene_branch
columns.description: The branch of the beneficiary's bank.

columns.name: bene_pos
columns.description: The point of sale associated with the beneficiary.

columns.name: charge_acc
columns.description: The account that incurs the charges for the transaction.

columns.name: exchange_rate
columns.description: The exchange rate applied to the transaction.

columns.name: metadata
columns.description: Additional metadata related to the transaction.

columns.name: trace_no
columns.description: A number used to trace the transaction.

columns.name: tranx_method
columns.description: The method used to conduct the transaction.

columns.name: os
columns.description: The operating system of the device used for the transaction.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year in which the transaction took place.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month in which the transaction took place.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day on which the transaction took place.

columns.name: transaction_code_domain
columns.description: Code representing the domain of the transaction.

columns.name: transaction_code_family
columns.description: Code representing the family category of the transaction.

columns.name: transaction_code_subfamily
columns.description: Code representing the subfamily category of the transaction.

columns.name: acceptor_name_t1
columns.description: The name of the entity accepting the transaction.
